title: KussKuss
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Western, Buffet, Beer/Wine, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Kuche & Gemeinderaum. Cafe offering fresh daily changing dishes such as burritos, soup, sandwiches, and more. Burgers served Wed-Sun evenings. Has vegan options. Offers Sunday brunch buffet til 5pm with live piano music; reservations recommended. Stays open til late on jam/concert nights.
